rescuecore2.log

Class StreamLogReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • rescuecore2.log.AbstractLogReader
      • rescuecore2.log.StreamLogReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LogReader

    public class StreamLogReader
extends AbstractLogReader
    An class for reading kernel logs from a stream.
